channel.title: My Portfolio Website on Jaemin Lee
channel.description: Recent content in My Portfolio Website on Jaemin Lee

item.title: Project 1: K-Pop Analysis
item.description: Created a program which returns the daily predicted number of hours one listens to K-Pop (MAE ~ 1.2 hours). Found the K-Pop dataset here: https://figshare.com/articles/KPOP_DATA_xlsx/12093648/2 Engineered features from the text of each column. Explored the data to analyze the relationships among the features. Built five different regression models - Linear, Lasso, Ridge, Random Forest, and XGBoost. Optimized the Random Forest and the XGBoost model using GridsearchCV to find the optimal parameters.

item.title: Project 2: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Created a program which determines whether the tweets are hatred-related tweets or not with a 95% accuracy. Got a Twitter dataset from Kaggle Cleaned the data using the tweet-preprocessor library and the regular expression library Split the training and the test data by 70/30 ratio Vectorized the tweets using the CountVectorizer library Built a model using Support Vector Classifier Achieved a 95% accuracy Link to GitHub Repository
